text: @ASlavitt @chrislhayes Yep. They'd be around 100,000 deaths scaled up to the US population. Their past few days have been worse per capita than the worst day in the US. Sweden is not handling it well, particularly since we don't know how long immunity lasts to Covid-19 or even for sure if we'd get any.
